Meet Ruzena Bajcsy, one of world's biggest legends in robotics. She and her team around John McCarthy coined the term 'artificial intelligence' in 1955. A true fighter. She lost her parents in Nazi concentration camps, grew up in an orphanage, emigrated from communist Czecho-Slovakia, did her PhD. at Stanford and today is a professor at UC Berkeley, the best public university in the US. Here she mentors upcoming generations of scientists. She is one of 50 Most Important Women in Science. 84 years of true inspiration!

I met Jon while working at Launch Festival.  Launch Festival is the world's largest startup event hosted by Jason Calacanis.  Jon was an exceptional volunteer who has exceptional relationship building skills.  He has made a concerted effort to stay in contact with me since the event.I am currently serving in an ad hoc advisory role for Jon in his company,  ZULLOO. Don Baker
Trade Management, Pricing and Category Management Practitioner
March 8, 2009, Don worked with Jon but at different companies

It is my honor to recommend Jon Zifcak.   I have had the pleasure to know and work with Jon for the last five years. He first worked with me as the architect and builder of my home.  I have had the blessing of Jon‚Äôs good council in the areas of Real Estate Sales and Finance as Jon is educated in both of these areas. The characteristics of Jon that attracted my attention are his integrity, knowledge of his businesses and entrepreneurship.Jon brings to all of his activities energy, enthusiasm, and commitment. This is to be expected in any successful entrepreneur, and in this regard Jon fits in well. Be it in the management of his own construction company or in the marketing of his real estate business, Jon delivers key insights and constructive ideas.  He has an inclusive nature.   This speaks to his overall intellect and ability to learn, attributes that will serve him well in graduate study. Jon and I are separated in age by over 15 years. But he is a valued friend and advisor.   Jon finished in the top 10% of his undergraduate class and his intellect and business acumen have translated well into practical application for the constituents he serves.  What I find most engaging in Jon's character are his interests outside of his work.  Jon is very engaged in his church and has a value system that I would judge superior to most people that I have met.   He is a dedicated Husband and Father who is committed to giving back to his community.Jon Zifcak is a valued associate and friend whom I have come can rely on, regardless of the difficulty of the task at hand or the novelty of the challenge. His combination of intelligence, commitment, perseverance, creativity, and compassionate character will certainly make him a valuable member of any team.

summary: Jon Zifcak is a result-driven, serial entrepreneur with 20+ years of leadership and technical expertise in business, technology and real estate. Having worked with customer segments all over the United States and Europe, he has earned himself a strong track record of innovation, integrity and initiative. Passionate about new technology, making a difference, and helping others.üá∏üá∞
